parameters.name: fnEmitter_electron
parameters.comment: charge represents an electron charge. i.e. it is a negative number

parameters.name: fnEmitter_hole
parameters.comment: charge represents a hole charge. i.e. it is a positive number

parameters.name: Ey_me_Jey
parameters.comment: point current. the extra dy in the numerator is to convert it to a line element.

parameters.name: Ey_me_Jhy
parameters.comment: point current. the extra dy in the numerator is to convert it to a line element.

parameters.name: Jmetaly_muleq_masky
parameters.comment: it eliminates average effects on the edges

parameters.name: rho_me_DivJhy
parameters.comment: the extra _dz_ in the denominator is to transform charge to charge density. since Jh is a point current, first it is multiplied by dy to convert it to a line element, then it is devided by dz to convert it to a surface current (2D volumetric current)

updateSequences.name: update-E
updateSequences.comment: put Jmetaly_muleq_masky and Jmetalz_muleq_maskz after Jmetaly/z updates for sharp edge truncation.
